articles.title: Foreign Minister urges Odisha Education Minister to take action against those responsible for Prakriti case
articles.description: KATHMANDU: Foreign Minister Dr. Arzu Rana has urged Odisha’s Higher Education Minister, Surjya Narayan Patro, to ensure an impartial investigation into the death of Nepali student Prakriti Lamsal. Speaking with Minister Patro over the phone on Wednesday, Rana…
articles.content:
KATHMANDU: Foreign Minister Dr. Arzu Rana has urged Odisha’s Higher Education Minister, Surjya Narayan Patro, to ensure an impartial investigation into the death of Nepali student Prakriti Lamsal.

articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.title: Which country in the world has no rivers?
articles.description: Saudi Arabia, despite lacking natural rivers and lakes, manages its water supply through the world’s largest desalination operations, ancient wells, and temporary rainwater channels called wadis. The country also invests in green projects and water recycling.…
